00372 inline CByteImage::RowIterator CByteImage::Row(UINT32 i)
00373 {
00374         return RowIterator(m_Image.ppAllScanLines[i],GetMinX(), GetMaxX());
00375 }
00376 
00377 inline CByteImage::ConstRowIterator CByteImage::ConstRow(UINT32 i) const
00378 {
00379         return ConstRowIterator(m_Image.ppAllScanLines[i],GetMinX(),GetMaxX());
00380 }
00381 
00382 inline CByteImage::ColumnIterator CByteImage::Column(UINT32 i)
00383 {
00384         return ColumnIterator(i,m_Image.ppAllScanLines[GetMinY()],
00385                                                         m_Image.ppAllScanLines[GetMaxY()-1]-m_Image.ByteWidth,m_Image.ByteWidth);
00386 }
00387 
00388 inline const CByteImage::ConstColumnIterator CByteImage::ConstColumn(UINT32 i) const
00389 {
00390         return ConstColumnIterator(i,m_Image.ppAllScanLines[GetMinY()],
00391                                                         m_Image.ppAllScanLines[GetMaxY()-1]-m_Image.ByteWidth,m_Image.ByteWidth);
00392 }
00393 
00394 inline UINT32 CByteImage::GetPixel(int x, int y) const
00395 {
00396         // For 24 b/p: R+G*256+B*256*256
00397         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00398 
00399         if ((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00400                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00401         {
00402                 return m_ppPixel[y][x];
00403         }
00404         else
00405         {
00406                 ostringstream ost;
00407                 ost << "CByteImage::GetPixel("  << x << "," << y << ") Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00408                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00409                 return 0;
00410         }
00411 }
00412 
00413 inline UINT32 CByteImage::GetPixel(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos) const
00414 {
00415         // For 24 b/p: R+G*256+B*256*256
00416         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00417         int x=Pos.GetX();
00418         int y=Pos.GetY();
00419 
00420         if ((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00421                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00422         {
00423                 return m_ppPixel[y][x];
00424         }
00425         else
00426         {
00427                 ostringstream ost;
00428                 ost << "CByteImage::GetPixel" << Pos << " Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00429                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00430                 return 0;
00431         }
00432 }
00433 
00434 inline UINT32 CByteImage::GetPixel(const CPoint2D<INT16>& Pos) const

00436         // For 24 b/p: R+G*256+B*256*256

00438         int x=Pos.GetX();
00439         int y=Pos.GetY();

00441         if ((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00442                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))

00444                 return m_ppPixel[y][x];
00445         }

00449                 ost << "CByteImage::GetPixel" << Pos << " Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;

00451                 return 0;

00454 
00455 inline bool CByteImage::SetPixel(int x, int y, UINT32 Color)
00456 {
00457         // returns false if outside image
00458         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00459 
00460         if ((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00461                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00462         {
00463                 m_ppPixel[y][x]=(UINT8) Color;
00464                 return true;
00465         }
00466         else
00467         {
00468                 ostringstream ost;
00469                 ost << "CByteImage::SetPixel("  << x << "," << y << ") Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00470                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00471                 return false;
00472         }
00473 }
00474 
00475 inline bool CByteImage::SetPixel(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos, UINT32 Color)
00476 {
00477         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00478         int x=Pos.GetX();
00479         int y=Pos.GetY();
00480 
00481         if ((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00482                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00483         {
00484                 m_ppPixel[y][x]=(UINT8) Color;
00485                 return true;
00486         }
00487         else
00488         {
00489                 ostringstream ost;
00490                 ost << "CByteImage::SetPixel" << Pos << " Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00491                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00492                 return false;
00493         }
00494 }
00495

00499         int x=Pos.GetX();
00500         int y=Pos.GetY();

00503                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))

00506                 return true;

00508         else

00513                 return false;

00517 inline UINT32 CByteImage::GetPixelFast(int x, int y) const
00518 {
00519         // no range check
00520         return m_ppPixel[y][x];
00521 }
00522 
00523 inline UINT32 CByteImage::GetPixelFast(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos) const
00524 {
00525         // no range check
00526         return m_ppPixel[Pos.GetY()][Pos.GetX()];
00527 }
00528 
00529 inline UINT32 CByteImage::GetPixelFast(const CPoint2D<INT16>& Pos) const
00530 {
00531         // no range check
00532         return m_ppPixel[Pos.GetY()][Pos.GetX()];
00533 }

00565 inline int CByteImage::GetMinX() const
00566 {
00567         // get min. X relative to origo
00568         if (ROIActive()==true)
00569                 return m_ROIUpperLeft.GetX();
00570         else
00571                 return 0;
00572 }
00573 
00574 inline int CByteImage::GetMinY() const
00575 {
00576         // get min. Y relative to origo
00577         if (ROIActive()==true)
00578                 return m_ROIUpperLeft.GetY();
00579         else
00580                 return 0;
00581 }
00582

00584 {
00585         // get max. X relative to origo
00586         return m_Image.Width;

00590 {
00591         // get max. Y relative to origo

00595 inline UINT16 CByteImage::GetBits() const
00596 {
00597         // get bits per pixel - allways 8 for CByteImage

00599 }
00600 
00601 inline CPoint2D<int> CByteImage::GetOrigo() const
00602 {
00603         return CPoint2D<int>(0,0);
00604 }
00605 
00606 inline bool CByteImage::SetROI(const CPoint2D<INT32>& UL, const CPoint2D<INT32>& LR)
00607 {
00608         if ((UL.GetX()>=LR.GetX()) || (UL.GetY()>=LR.GetY()))
00609         {
00610                 ostringstream ost;
00611                 ost << "CByteImage::SetROI() UL " << UL << " greater than LR " << LR << 
00612                         " in at least one of the dimensions" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00613                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00614                 return false;
00615         }
00616         else if ((UL.GetX()<0) || (UL.GetY()<0) || 
00617                     (LR.GetX()>(INT32)m_Image.Width) || (LR.GetY()>(INT32)m_Image.Height))
00618         {
00619                 ostringstream ost;
00620                 ost << "CByteImage::SetROI() UL " << UL << " or LR " << LR <<
00621                         " outside image dimensions: " << CPoint2D<int>(GetMinX(),GetMinY()) <<
00622                         " - " << CPoint2D<int>(GetMaxX(),GetMaxY()) << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00623                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00624                 return false;
00625         }
00626         m_ROIActive=true;
00627         m_ROIUpperLeft=UL;
00628         m_ROILowerRight=LR;
00629         return true;
00630 }
00631
